messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Good Day Crew, The time is currently 12:40 and may you activate your suit sensors so out medical team can locate you when a vender falls on you

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Todays goals are to follow, | 1. Keep the station clean, The station shall look clean so that CENTCOM and Nano will be happy| 2. The new meterorite shield is to be created to defend us from debrie

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we are sending a team to kill the cats

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: It seems like CentCom dont like pets on the job, We should also kill the CE's bird, The HoP's Dog, And the other heads pets while we do

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Unless you revolt they are gonna kill all the cats. And if the CMO cant keep her cats we shouldn't keep our pets either

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Please dont revolt. I am not gonna cover for you and will call centcom instantly

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Helps, Are you saying that as a joke or because you are serious

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: yeah a good point was made, kill the rest of the pets. filthy flea bags

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Testing Lab.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we detect another kitten in HOS office, execute it imideantly

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Technical Storage.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.
